data.message: Something I wish I knew a lot about is keeping my facebook feed current. It's currently showing things from 12-28 hours ago, and nothing recent. I remember when you could filter it to show most recent. Is there a reason FB changed it?  How can we fix that again?

replies.message: Hi Mike. The News Feed is currently, by default, viewed in Top Stories. To change it to Most Recent view via desktop: click on the down arrow in News Feed (located top left) and click Most Recent. To change it to Most Recent view via mobile: click the more button (usually looks like 3 dots or lines), scroll down to Feeds and click on Most Recent. -Ryan
Thank you Ryan! I found it and was able to fix my profile. Awesome work!
sometimes people like the stuff that isn't recent and thats how it shows up. But that most likely means they like to look through your timeline Lol

Hi Levi. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with uploading cover photos. Please note your cover image has to be at least 720 pixels wide. Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/220070894714080 -Ryan
